Quality Education.reason: This course is designed to provide you with an in-depth understanding of the subject covered by the materials - fundamental financial accounting.
evidence: This course is designed to provide you with an in-depth understanding of the subject covered by the materials - fundamental financial accounting.
The course materials are presented through a mix of pre-recorded class lectures, assigned readings and problems.
The course aims to provide students with basic skills to prepare, read, and use financial statements.
